#id=1
#text=The first time I rode a public bus was in high school .
#id=2
#text=I needed a ride to get home from school since no family members could get me .
#id=3
#text=So I waited for the bus until it came .
#id=4
#text=Then I stepped onto the bus , I inserted the fee of two dollars into the cash machine and the driver waived me on .
#id=5
#text=I went and took my seat and minded my own business .
#id=6
#text=Once the bus was on its way , I waited until we were close to my house .
#id=7
#text=I then pulled on the yellow stop cord that is hung throughout the bus .
#id=8
#text=It sends a message to the driver that someone on the bus wants to get off at the next stop .
#id=9
#text=When the driver pulled up to a stop , I got off , I said thank you to the driver to be polite and grateful and he nodded his head at me .
#text=Then I walked the rest of the way home .
#text=I had always thought it would be hard and gross to take a public bus , but it was actually kind of nice .
#text=There are also seat belts on public buses , but you are not required to wear one if you do not want to .
